reviewText: Very unhappy that I purchased a DVD that could not be played in the US.
The best steel book from the MCU!
Exactly what I wanted.  Like new.big variety of other movies including 3d blueray  Highly recommend yodasyardsale.

I haven't watch this version of it yet, saving it since its a import and will go with my other collections I have. Love the movie but not sure whats all on here if it's any better then the US copy of the movie. So not able to give a very good review of this but it looks cool.
